name: WFH (Bullet Hell Jam 2022)
description:
It's another week of working from home. There's only so much time left in the day and you need to make sure you can keep your energy up if you want to complete your workload and impress your boss! Unfortunately, your equipment isn't going to make it any easier on you, what with all the stuff they are shooting you with. Hey, at least it beats working in an office, right?

Controls:
WASD / Left Tumbstick - Move
Space / Right Bumper - Hold To Fire
Arrow Keys / Right Thumbstick - Hold To Aim
(Played with an Xbox One Controller)
Fire projectiles at your malfunctioning equipment to get them to stop firing for a few seconds. Stay energized until the timer reaches 0 to win the day. Projectiles will only fire in the direction you are aiming.

Still In Progress;
Music/Sound Effects
Better visual effects/better art maybe
